alert.note: Alert for Bay; Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 17 at 8:27PM EDT until March 17 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... South central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 727 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Panama City Beach, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Springfield, Hiland Park, West Bay, Inlet Beach, Southport, Dirego Park, Gulf Resort Beach, Bahama Beach, Edgewater Gulf Beach, Sunnyside, Laird, Laguna Beach, Vicksburg, Hollywood Beach, Bid-a-Wee, Brannonville and Cedar Grove. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
